codeGet:
select rowidtochar(rowid) "id",
sobterm_term_code TERM_CODE
,SOBTERM_REFUND_IND     REFUND_BY_CRN   -- Refund By Total Indicator.                                                                                                                                                                                    
,SOBTERM_BYCRN_IND      REFUND_BY_TOTAL  -- Assess fees by CRN indicator.                                                                                                                                                                                 
,SOBTERM_FEE_ASSESSMENT ONLINE_FEE_ASSESSMENT -- This field indicates whether fee assessment can be initiated on-line from the Registration From (SFAREGS). "Y"-allow on-line fee assessment, "N"-only batch fee assessment                                    
,SOBTERM_FEE_ASSESSMNT_EFF_DATE ONLINE_ASSESS_EFF_DATE -- This field identifies the effective date associated with fees assessed on-line at registration. This date is associated with charges on the student Account Detail Record.                                    
,SOBTERM_FEE_ASSESS_VR FEE_ASSESS_VR                      -- Web Self Service and VR Fee Assessment Indicator.                                                                                                                                                             
,SOBTERM_PRINT_BILL_VR PRINT_BILL_VR                     --  Self Service and VR Print Bill Indicator.                                                                                                                                                                     
,SOBTERM_CUTOFF_DATE ORIG_CHARGE_CUTOFF_DATE             -- Last date calculated charges are considered original                                                                                                                                                          
,SOBTERM_TIV_DATE_SOURCE TITLE_IV_START_END_DATE_SOURCE  -- Source of Title IV default start and end date. T=Term; P=Part-of-Term.                                                                                                                                        
,SOBTERM_DYNAMIC_SCHED_TERM_IND DISPLAY_ON_WEB_TERM_LIST -- Indicate whether this term should be displayed on the web select term pulldown or not.                                                                                                                        
,SOBTERM_ASSESS_SWAP_IND ALLOW_COURSE_SWAP --                 Indicates whether to allow course/hours swapping in registration fee assessment.                                                                                                                              
,SOBTERM_ASSESS_REV_NRF_IND ALLOW_NONREG_REVERSAL -- Indicates whether to allow the reversal of charges to detail codes having a category code other than TUI or FEE in registration fee assessment.                                                               
,SOBTERM_ASSESS_REG_GRACE_IND ALLOW_REG_GRACE -- Indicates whether to allow grace when dropping a course with the same amount of bill hours as a course added on the same initial day of a student's registration.                                             
,SOBTERM_ASSESS_ADM_CREDIT_IND AUTO_ASSESS_ADMIN_PAGE_CREDIT --  ADMINISTRATIVE CREDIT PROCESSING INDICATOR: Indicates if online credit processing should occur automatically when processing transactions in administrative pages.                                            
,SOBTERM_ASSESS_SS_CREDIT_IND AUTO_ASSESS_ONLINE_CREDIT -- SELF SERVICE CREDIT PROCESSING INDICATOR: Indicates if online credit processing should occur automatically when processing transactions in self service registration.                                         
  from sobterm
where sobterm_term_code = :term_code
